Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that there is suitable supervision of your control measures for preventing or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlling exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely welding fume, created during welding activities in your Fabrication Workshop.
During my visit on 10 March 2022 I observed employees welding without use of the provided control measures including local exhaust ventilation and respiratory protective equipment.
